input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Aero Jersey Men's'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Crit Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Xl Pro Team Crit Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Legion Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Brevet Logo-Print Mesh-Panelled Recycled Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Classic Flyweight Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha St Raphael Men's Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Lightweight Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Training Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Classic Flyweight Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Training Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Brevet Element Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Aero XS Pro Team Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Classic Jersey Men's Long Sleeve'
  - Name='men Santini Paris-Roubaix 2025 Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Uci World Champion Jersey Mondo Man'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT C2 Evo Jersey Ultra Blood'
  - Name='Assos Dyora RS Speed Club 2024 Top-Tier Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Dyora R Women's Jersey S11'
  - Name='Sportful BodyFit Team Jersey'
  - Name='Pac Summit Men's Aero Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Aero Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are high-performance cycling jerseys designed for serious cyclists, featuring advanced fabrics and fitted construction likely with moisture-wicking and aerodynamic properties, matching the core functional characteristics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Crit Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a performance cycling jersey focused on criterium racing, similar high-quality technical features and fit, closely relevant to the Core Jersey's intended use and design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Xl Pro Team Crit Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above with size specification; fundamentally similar cycling jersey designed for performance and comfort during rides.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Legion Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a high-performance aero cycling jersey with similar tech features and fit, making it highly relevant to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Brevet Logo-Print Mesh-Panelled Recycled Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A recycled fabric cycling jersey with mesh panels aligns with the sustainable and breathable aspects of the Core Jersey, though possibly more race or style-focused but still highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A core high-performance cycling jersey from Rapha's Pro Team line, sharing many likely features such as compression, moisture control, and pockets.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar high-end cycling jersey with aero fit and technical fabrics suitable for performance cycling just like the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another core Rapha Pro Team product that matches closely in function, design, and intended cyclist use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Classic Flyweight Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A lightweight cycling jersey focused on flyweight construction differs slightly in focus but still a cycling jersey with performance features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha St Raphael Men's Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A similarly designed Pro Team aero racing jersey from Rapha, matching in purpose, tech features, and form-fitting construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Core Lightweight Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This jersey matches perfectly with the reference product name and description, indicating an almost identical product focusing on lightweight performance and comfort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Training Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A jersey optimized for training with Pro Team features is very relevant but may have slight differences in aerodynamic emphasis compared to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Classic Flyweight Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A repeat of the Classic Flyweight Jersey, similarly a lightweight cycling jersey but slightly different focus from the Core Jersey's durable compression.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Training Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Training-specific cycling jersey from the Pro Team line shares many functional traits but may differ slightly in fabric or fit emphasis.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Brevet Element Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A jersey designed possibly for longer rides or brevet style cycling with durable elements but may differ in fit and fabric technology from the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Aero XS Pro Team Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An aero-focused Pro Team cycling jersey aligns very closely with Core Jersey's high-performance design and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic cycling jersey naming suggests a more general or entry-level product, thus less relevant compared to high-performance Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Classic Jersey Men's Long Sleeve
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A long sleeve classic jersey differs in sleeve length and possibly fabric weight, making it less directly comparable though still a cycling jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: men Santini Paris-Roubaix 2025 Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A long sleeve cycling jersey focused on a specific event differs from the short sleeve, high-compression Core Jersey's profile but is still relevant as cycling apparel.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Uci World Champion Jersey Mondo Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A top-tier, possibly race-specific world champion jersey shares technical fabric and aerodynamic design elements, relevant but more specialized in branding and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GT C2 Evo Jersey Ultra Blood
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Assos Mille GT is a high-performance cycling jersey line with advanced fabrics and tailored compression, very close in function to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Dyora RS Speed Club 2024 Top-Tier Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A top-tier aero cycling jersey from Assos with advanced materials and fit, closely matches the Core Jersey's performance features and intent.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: A women's specific version of a high-performance cycling jersey, similar construction and fabric tech but gender-specific fit may reduce direct relevancy slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful BodyFit Team Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A team fit cycling jersey designed for performance aligns well with Core Jerseyâ€™s function though possibly different branding and minor fit variations.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pac Summit Men's Aero Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's aero cycling jersey designed for performance rides is highly relevant though brand and specific tech features may differ.
